sentences.sContent: We are determined to bring the people responsible to justice.
sentences.sCn: 我们决意要将肇事者绳之以法。

sentences.sContent: ...when the most recent oil price shock has been partly responsible for kicking off the great recession...
...If we are all to be responsible for one another's health insurance...
...Considering that labor costs are responsible for up to 80% of a daycare center's expenses...
...She also said immigrants were responsible for pushing up UK house prices...
...Students also need to learn to work independently and to make responsible decisions...
...These changing life styles are responsible for the increasing number of people who must rush meals or sometimes simply go without them...
...Risky Business We are each responsible for our own decisions...
...Tiffany is responsible for interviewing applicants for some of the positions with her company...

remMethod.val: re ＋ spons(约定) ＋ ible → 遵守约定 → 有责任感的

words.tran: 回答；作出反应；承担责任

trans.tranCn: 需负责任的， 承担责任的； 有责任感的， 负责可靠的； 责任重大的， 重要的
trans.tranOther: if someone is responsible for an accident, mistake, crime etc, it is their fault or they can be blamed
